description: For example, the default for instance_uuid_format is '[instance: %(uuid)s] ' but unless the value is quoted in nova.conf, we loose the trailing space.
title: Some string values in nova.conf.sample need to be quoted

comments.content: For example, the default for instance_uuid_format is '[instance: %(uuid)s] ' but unless the value is quoted in nova.conf, we loose the trailing space.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markmc

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/11866
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/680c80d9eaafb1ab486f070e23c6158b5a276040

commit 680c80d9eaafb1ab486f070e23c6158b5a276040
Author: Mark McLoughlin <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Aug 23 11:59:57 2012 +0100

    Ensure log formats are quoted in sample conf
    
    Fixes bug #1040583
    
    This ensures the sample conf has:
    
      # instance_format="[instance: %(uuid)s] "
    
    rather than:
    
      # instance_format=[instance: %(uuid)s]
    
    Fix suggested by Vish.
    
    Change-Id: If20aa7276d6868a6885abc85f046733adc40331f
    DocImpact: update nova.conf docs
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
